headline: CrowdStrike Expands From Enterprise To Consumer And National Cybersecurity Deals
summary: CrowdStrike Holdings (NasdaqGS:CRWD) agreed a partnership with NordVPN to bring its enterprise threat intelligence to consumer users. The company also signed a Memorandum of Understanding with Saudi Aramco focused on cybersecurity and AI collaboration in Saudi Arabia. The initiatives aim to extend CrowdStrike's reach into consumer protection and national scale cybersecurity tied to Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030. CrowdStrike is known for its cloud based endpoint protection and threat...

headline: CrowdStrike Named a Customers’ Choice in the 2026 Gartner® Peer Insights™ ‘Voice of the Customer’ for User Authentication Report
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, February 12, 2026--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced it has been named the Customers’ Choice in the 2026 Gartner Peer Insights™ ‘Voice of the Customer’ for User Authentication report.1 CrowdStrike has the most 5-star reviews, the most verified reviews, and the highest product capability rating of 4.7 (tied), of any vendor in the report, based on 179 overall responses as of January 2026 and a 96% Willingness to Recommend score. headline: NordVPN Selects CrowdStrike to Deliver Industry-Leading Threat Intelligence to Millions of Consumers
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, February 12, 2026--NordVPN has selected CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) to power its Threat Protection Pro™ feature, bringing industry-leading threat intelligence trusted by enterprises and governments to millions of consumers worldwide. Through this collaboration, CrowdStrike Threat Intelligence enhances NordVPN’s ability to protect users against modern cyber threats with real-time, adversary-driven intelligence delivered in a simple, privacy-first experience.
